state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First stop, make an attempt to travel east. With that done, try to go south. And then, venture east. And then, retrieve the American style latchkey from the stand. And then, unlock the American style portal. After that, ensure that the American style portal is open. Then, head south. Once you finish that, venture west. Then, head west. After that, head south. Then, make an effort to venture south. If you can succeed at that, try to move east. Then, try to travel north. Then, lift the passkey from the floor of the recreation zone. That's it! -= Workshop =- Look at you, bigshot, walking into a workshop like it isn't some huge deal. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Workshop =-0/1
next_state: -= Cookery =- You arrive in a cookery. A standard kind of place. Let's see what's in here. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors?
